languages.text: "Корабль был на Эпитафии, Амарнат на нем путешествовал и исследовал техночуму, Номос родились в результате инцидента. Как же вышло, что никто из команды не знал всей правды?"

"The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"
languages.original_text: "Корабль был на Эпитафии, Амарнат на нем путешествовал и исследовал техночуму, Номос родились в результате инцидента. Как же вышло, что никто из команды не знал всей правды?"

traits.locale_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

"The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

"The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

"The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

languages.text: «La nave estaba en Epitafio. Amarnat viajaba a bordo para investigar la tecnoplaga y Nomos surgió como consecuencia de un incidente. ¿Cómo es posible que nadie de la tripulación supiera toda la verdad?».
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: «La nave estaba en Epitafio. Amarnat viajaba a bordo para investigar la tecnoplaga y Nomos surgió como consecuencia de un incidente. ¿Cómo es posible que nadie de la tripulación supiera toda la verdad?».

languages.text: 「船はエピタフにあり、アマルナトはその船に乗船し、テック・ブライトの研究を行い、ノモスはある事件が原因で誕生した。ならば、なぜクルーの誰も真実を知らないのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: 「船はエピタフにあり、アマルナトはその船に乗船し、テック・ブライトの研究を行い、ノモスはある事件が原因で誕生した。ならば、なぜクルーの誰も真実を知らないのだ？」

languages.text: “这艘船曾降落在荒垄碑碣，阿玛纳特乘坐它调查技术枯萎症的事情，而诺莫斯的诞生又是某场事故的结果。既然如此，怎么可能没有任何一位船员知道真相呢？”
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: “这艘船曾降落在荒垄碑碣，阿玛纳特乘坐它调查技术枯萎症的事情，而诺莫斯的诞生又是某场事故的结果。既然如此，怎么可能没有任何一位船员知道真相呢？”

languages.text: « Le vaisseau était sur Épitaphe. Amarnat a voyagé à son bord pour enquêter sur la technopeste et Nomos est né suite à un incident. Comment est-il possible que personne à bord n'ait su toute la vérité ? »
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: « Le vaisseau était sur Épitaphe. Amarnat a voyagé à son bord pour enquêter sur la technopeste et Nomos est né suite à un incident. Comment est-il possible que personne à bord n'ait su toute la vérité ? »

languages.text: "Das Schiff war auf Epitaph, Amarnat war an Bord, hat die Tech-Seuche untersucht, und Nomos wurden als Ergebnis eines Vorfalls geboren. Wie war es also möglich, dass niemand in der Crew die ganze Wahrheit kannte?"
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Schiff war auf Epitaph, Amarnat war an Bord, hat die Tech-Seuche untersucht, und Nomos wurden als Ergebnis eines Vorfalls geboren. Wie war es also möglich, dass niemand in der Crew die ganze Wahrheit kannte?"

languages.text: "Amarnat, Sinyazıt'ta gemiyle seyahat ediyor ve tekno afetini araştırıyormuş. Nomos da bir hadise sonucu meydana gelmiş. O hâlde nasıl oldu da tayfadan olayların tamamını bilen birisi çıkmadı?"
languages.original_text: "The ship was on Epitaph, Amarnat travelled aboard it, investigating the tech-blight, and Nomos was born as a result of an incident. So how was it possible that no one in the crew knew the whole truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat, Kitabe'de gemiyle seyahat ediyor ve tekno afetini araştırıyordu. Nomos da bir hadise sonucu meydana geldi. O hâlde nasıl oldu da tayfadan olayların tamamını bilen birisi çıkmadı?"
